org.activebpel.rt.bpel.server.logging
Class AeLoggingFilter

java.lang.Object
  org.activebpel.rt.bpel.server.logging.AeLoggingFilter
All Implemented Interfaces:
IAeLoggingFilter
Direct Known Subclasses:
AeLoggingFilter.AeAllowAllFilter
public class AeLoggingFilter
extends java.lang.Object
implements IAeLoggingFilter

Base class with factory method to return a filter given the config setting for logging.

Nested Class Summary

isEnabled

public boolean isEnabled()
Description copied from interface: IAeLoggingFilter
Returns true if the filter will accept one or more process info events. If false, then there's no reason to listen for process events.
